2348.TW.summary: Hiyes International Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate agency and brokerage businesses in Taiwan. Its real estate agency and brokerage business include pre-sale housing, new housing, surplus housing, general office, and land and parking space, as well as product planning and advice, integrated marketing, and transaction intermediary transfer services. The company also offers engineering construction; architectural design and interior decoration; building materials; hydropower configuration; financial communication; and price assessment and book writing services. The company was formerly known as Veutron Corp and changed its name to Hiyes International Co., Ltd. in April 2013. Hiyes International Co., Ltd. is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2505.TW.summary: Kuo Yang Construction Co.,Ltd engages in the construction of national housing, commercial housing, and industrial plants in Taiwan. It is also involved in the commercial lease and sale of the building. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2527.TW.long_name: Hung Ching Development & Construction Co. Ltd.
2527.TW.summary: Hung Ching Development & Construction Co. Ltd. constructs residential and commercial buildings for rent and sale in Taiwan. It provides residential buildings, villas, apartments, shops, factories, and offices, as well as parking space. Hung Ching Development & Construction Co. Ltd. is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2528.TW.summary: Crowell Development Corp. engages in the construction of commercial and residential buildings for rental and sale in Taiwan. It also constructs parking lots and villas. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2530.TW.summary: Delpha Construction Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, constructs commercial buildings. It is also involved in the sale and lease of public housing; development of land; upholstery industry; and real estate agency, rental, and investment activities. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2701.TW.summary: Wanhwa Enterprise Company engages in the rental of commercial buildings, and operation of cinemas and mobile amusement parks in Taiwan. The company provides leasing services for business hotels, offices, supermarkets, restaurants, shopping malls, department stores, and bookstores. It also offers roof playground, including the playgrounds, sports, and educational and other areas; and operates digital cinemas. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3266.TW.summary: Sunty Development Co., LTD builds, rents, and sells residential and commercial building projects in Greater Taipei, Taiwan. It undertakes residential unit, office space, and parking facility projects. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5525.TW.summary: Sweeten Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd. constructs and develops residential, commercial, and industrial projects. It is also involved in urban renewal development and land development activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6177.TW.summary: Da-Li Development Co.,Ltd. operates as a full-service, multi-family, and diversified real estate investment and development company. Da-Li Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

9902.TW.summary: Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. engages in the international trade business. It develops and rents residential and other buildings; rents minibus; and sells gas-electric garbage truck businesses. The company was formerly known as Tidehold Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. in 1998. Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

9940.TW.summary: Sinyi Realty Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real-estate brokerage and development businesses in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company develops, constructs, rents, and sells residential buildings and factories. It is also involved in the real estate management and identification, and real estate marketing planning activities; market information consultation; provision of management consulting, information software, data processing, and electronic information services; and publication business. In addition, the company offers professional construction, building decoration construction, interior decoration, hardware, and general merchandise products and services; and construction materials, furniture, sanitary ware, and ceramic products, as well as engages in the wholesale of building materials. Further, it develops commercial buildings and auxiliary facilities. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
